title: User registration success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid email, password, and role selection.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Enter a valid email address
Enter a strong password complying with password policy
Select user role (customer or professional)
Submit the registration form
Registration completes successfully and redirects to profile setup or dashboard

title: User login success with correct credentials
description: Verify login succeeds with valid registered email and password for both roles.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid registered email and password
Press the login button
User is authenticated and redirected to appropriate dashboard

title: Login failure with incorrect credentials
description: Verify login attempt fails when incorrect email or password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid or unregistered email or incorrect password
Click the login button
Login is denied and appropriate error message is displayed

title: Password recovery process
description: Verify that users can recover password using registered email address.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Click on 'Forgot password' link
Enter registered email address
Submit password recovery request
Password reset email is sent to the registered email

title: Discover services via category browsing
description: Verify customers can browse service categories and view correct listings of services and providers.

steps.description: Navigate to the services browsing page
Select a service category
Display list of providers and services under selected category with correct details

title: Service discovery with filtering
description: Verify that the advanced filters (location, price, rating, availability) correctly filter service provider listings.

steps.description: Navigate to the service discovery page
Apply filters: location radius, price range, minimum rating, and availability date/time
Only providers matching all selected filters are displayed

title: Professional onboarding workflow completion
description: Verify professionals can complete multi-step onboarding wizard including business info, credentials, and offerings.

steps.description: Login as professional and open onboarding wizard
Complete business info step with valid data
Complete credentials step with proper documents and verification info
Complete service offerings selection step
Submit the onboarding wizard
Profile is created and status shows verified or pending verification appropriately

title: Booking creation with real-time availability check
description: Verify booking service allows users to select available time slots and successfully create an appointment with payment processing.

steps.description: As customer, select a service provider and open booking interface
Select an available appointment slot
Provide required booking details and proceed to payment
Complete payment with valid payment info
Booking is confirmed and user receives a confirmation notification

title: Booking rescheduling
description: Verify users can reschedule confirmed bookings to another available time slot and receive updated confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to user bookings page
Select a confirmed booking and choose to reschedule
Pick a new available time slot
Confirm reschedule action
Booking is updated with new time and confirmation notification is sent

title: Booking cancellation with refund policy
description: Verify users can cancel bookings within allowed timeframe and receive appropriate refund or cancellation notices.

steps.description: Access bookings page and select a booking eligible for cancellation
Cancel the booking
Cancellation is processed correctly, refund triggered if applicable, and user notified

title: Real-time provider location tracking with privacy controls
description: Verify that customer can view provider's live location with updates within 500ms latency and can opt-in/out of location sharing.

steps.description: Start a service delivery session with assigned provider
View provider location on the tracking map
Location updates are displayed in real-time with maximum 500ms latency
Toggle location sharing privacy settings as provider
Location sharing respects privacy preference immediately

title: In-app messaging send and receive
description: Verify users can send, receive and view messages, including text and media file sharing in real time.

steps.description: Navigate to messaging page
Select a conversation or start a new chat
Send a text message and verify delivery
Send a supported media file (image or document)
Messages and media appear instantly in the chat and notifications are received

title: Message history persistence and notifications
description: Verify that message history is persisted across sessions and users receive push/real-time notifications for new messages.

steps.description: Send messages in a conversation
Log out and log back in
Open the messaging page and load conversation
All previous messages are present and notifications arrive for new incoming messages

title: AI Chatbot assistance for FAQs and booking
description: Verify users can interact with AI chatbot to receive relevant answers for FAQs and assistance during booking workflow.

steps.description: Navigate to chatbot page
Ask common FAQ questions
Chatbot provides accurate, relevant responses matching FAQs
Request booking assistance via chatbot
Chatbot guides user through booking steps correctly

title: Submitting customer reviews and ratings
description: Verify customers can submit detailed reviews and ratings after service completion, and reviews are securely saved and displayed.

steps.description: After booking completion, navigate to the review page
Enter a rating score and detailed review comments
Submit the review
Review is stored, verified, and displayed on provider’s profile

title: Review submission validation and error handling
description: Verify the system prevents submission of invalid reviews such as empty comments or ratings out of range.

steps.description: Attempt to submit review with no rating or comment
User is shown an error message preventing submission
Attempt to submit rating out of allowed numeric range
Rating input validation blocks submission and shows error

title: Analytics dashboard data accuracy
description: Verify that analytics dashboards for customers and providers correctly reflect booking patterns, reviews, and performance data.

steps.description: Login as a customer and view analytics dashboard
Display booking history and usage patterns accurately
Login as a provider and open performance dashboard
Show correct booking, review, and rating summary data

title: Mobile app responsive behavior and offline support
description: Verify the mobile application UI is responsive across device screen sizes and critical features support offline mode and sync upon reconnect.

steps.description: Open mobile app on various device sizes and orientations
UI layout adjusts correctly without content clipping or overflow
Simulate offline network condition
Perform actions like browsing cached services and composing messages
App does not crash, queues offline actions, and syncs changes when online again

title: Route protection for authenticated and role-based access
description: Verify that application routes are protected based on authentication status and user role, preventing unauthorized access.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected customer-only page when not logged in
Redirect to login page
Login as professional and attempt to access customer-only page
Access is denied or redirected appropriately
Login as customer and access professional-only onboarding page
Access is denied or redirected appropriately

title: File upload validation during professional onboarding
description: Verify that uploaded files for credentials meet size and format restrictions and proper error messages are shown for invalid inputs.

steps.description: Upload document exceeding max allowed file size
File is rejected with an informative error message
Upload document with unsupported format
File is rejected and user prompted for supported formats
